overview: The purpose and intent of this measure is to establish the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund and repeal two existing conference center funds. This measure aims to standardize conference center programs across all campuses of the University of Hawaii System and facilitate the administration of conference center moneys. Your Committee has amended this measure by clarifying the permissible uses of moneys appropriated from the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund and making technical nonsubstantive amendments.
appropriations: The provided document does not specify any appropriations, funding amounts, or fiscal years for the establishment or operation of the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund.
assumptions_and_methodology: The provided document does not contain information on the assumptions, cost estimation methods, or data sources used for any financial projections related to this measure.
agency_impact: The University of Hawaii System will be impacted, as the measure intends to "standardize conference center programs across all campuses of the University of Hawaii System and facilitate the administration of conference center moneys." The University of Hawaii System provided "written comments in support of this measure." The measure also involves "Clarifying the permissible uses of moneys appropriated from the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund."
economic_impact: The provided document does not detail specific economic impacts such as cost savings or community benefits. The primary stated benefit is to "facilitate the administration of conference center moneys" by establishing a single revolving fund.
policy_impact: The policy impact of this measure is to "establish the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund and repeal two existing conference center funds." This action will "standardize conference center programs across all campuses of the University of Hawaii System." The measure was also amended for "Clarifying the permissible uses of moneys appropriated from the university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund."
revenue_sources: The measure establishes the "university of Hawaii conference center revolving fund." However, the provided document does not specify the sources of revenue that will supply this revolving fund.
six_year_fiscal_implications: The provided document does not contain information regarding the six-year fiscal implications of this measure. There are no projections on costs, staffing changes, recurring expenses, or program expansion. The text focuses solely on the establishment of the revolving fund and the repeal of existing funds to standardize and facilitate administration.
operating_revenue_impact: The provided document does not contain any information regarding the anticipated impacts on operating revenues resulting from this measure.
capital_expenditure_impact: The provided document does not mention any expected capital expenditures related to the program or measure, such as investments in facilities or equipment.
fiscal_implications_after_6_years: The provided document does not summarize any ongoing fiscal obligations, annual operating costs, or the sustainability of funding after a six-year period.
updates_from_previous_fiscal_note: No previous fiscal note was provided for comparison.
